import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png'; import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png'; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
description

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XS

Category: Women , T-Shirt , Crop Top

Tags: Modern , Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay
